Function reference

Data

Area boundary data

baltimore_city
Generalized political boundary for Baltimore City
baltimore_city_detailed
Detailed physical boundary for Baltimore City
baltimore_msa_counties
County boundaries for the Baltimore–Columbia–Towson MSA
neighborhoods
Neighborhood boundaries for Baltimore City
council_districts
Baltimore City Council Districts
legislative_districts
Maryland Legislative Districts for Baltimore City
congressional_districts
U.S. Congressional Districts for Baltimore City
planning_districts
Baltimore City Planning Districts
csas
Community Statistical Areas (2010)
police_districts
Baltimore City Police Districts
park_districts
Baltimore Park Districts

U.S. Census area boundary data

baltimore_blocks
U.S. Census Blocks (2010 Decennial)
baltimore_block_groups
U.S. Census Block Groups
baltimore_tracts
U.S. Census Tracts
baltimore_pumas
Public Use Microdata Areas (PUMAS)

Streets and transportation data

streets
Baltimore City Street Center lines
mta_bus_lines
Maryland Transit Administration (MTA) Bus Routes
mta_bus_stops
Maryland Transit Administration (MTA) Bus Stops
mta_light_rail_lines
Maryland Transit Administration (MTA) Light RailLink Stations
mta_light_rail_stations
Maryland Transit Administration (MTA) Light RailLink Stations
mta_marc_lines
MTA MARC Train Lines
mta_marc_stations
MTA MARC Train Stations
mta_subway_lines
Maryland Transit Administration (MTA) SubwayLink Metro Lines
mta_subway_stations
Maryland Transit Administration (MTA) SubwayLink Metro Stations
circulator_routes
Charm City Circulator Routes
circulator_stops
Charm City Circulator Stops

Education data

bcps_programs
Baltimore City Public School Programs
bcps_zones
Baltimore City Public Schools School Zones or School Attendance Zones

Assorted housing, land use, and other local data

adopted_plans
Adopted city plans, accepted community-initiated plans, and LINCS corridors
zoning
Baltimore City Zoning Code
hmt_2017
Housing Market Typology 2017
baltimore_mihp
Maryland Inventory of Historic Properties in Baltimore City
baltimore_water
Baltimore Water
baltimore_msa_water
Baltimore MSA water
parks
Baltimore City Parks
request_types
311 Service Request Types for Baltimore City
explore_baltimore
Stories from Explore Baltimore Heritage
wards_1797_1918
Historic Ward Boundaries, 1797-1918 for Baltimore City

Crosswalk tables

xwalk_block2tract
U.S. Census Block-to-Tract Crosswalk with 2010 Block Household Population
xwalk_csa2nsa
Community Statistical Area (CSA)-to-Neighborhood Statistical Area (NSA) Crosswalk
xwalk_neighborhood2tract
Neighborhood-to-U.S. Census Tract Crosswalk
xwalk_zip2csa
Zipcode-to-Community Statistical Area (NSA) Crosswalk

Functions for areas and data

Get and modify areas

get_area()
Get area of selected type
get_nearby_areas()
Get nearby areas
check_area()
Validate area provided to mapping or charting function.
buffer_area()
Get buffered area
clip_area()
Clip an area to a portion of the whole area
adjust_bbox()
Get bounding box buffered and adjusted to aspect ratio
adjust_bbox_asp()
Get bounding box adjusted to match aspect ratio

Get local data for area

get_area_data()
Get local or cached data for an area
get_area_census_geography()
Get U.S. Census geography overlapping with an area.
get_area_bcps_programs()
Get BCPS programs and attendance zones for a local area
get_area_zoning()
Get zoning data for an area
get_area_streets()
Get selected area streets
get_streets()
Get streets
filter_streets()
Filter streets Internal function for filtering streets by multiple parameters
named_intersections
Baltimore City street intersection names
get_intersection()
Get intersections
get_data_batch() get_area_batch()
Batch load or save data for an area, street, or intersection

Get remote data

get_area_property() format_property_data()
Get real property data
get_area_vacants()
Get vacant building notices
get_area_crime()
Get area crimes from Open Baltimore
get_area_911_calls()
Get area 911 calls for service from Open Baltimore
get_area_permits()
Get area building permits from Open Baltimore
get_area_esri_data()
Get data from an ArcGIS FeatureServer or MapServer
get_area_osm_data()
Get Open Street Map features for area
maryland_open_data_api_key()
Install a Maryland Open Data Portal API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use
get_maryland_open_resource()
Get dataset from Maryland Open Data portal with optional SoQL parameters
get_area_crashes()
Get vehicle crashes for area in Baltimore from Maryland Open Data portal
get_area_requests()
Get area 311 service requests from Open Baltimore
get_area_citations()
Get area citations from Open Baltimore

Download and cache data locally

cache_baltimore_data() cache_msa_streets() cache_edge_of_pavement() show_cached_files()
Cache data for mapbaltimore package

Functions for mapping data

Map local data using ggplot2 and sf

map_area_bcps_programs()
Map BCPS programs and attendance zones for a local area
map_area_highlighted()
Maps a highlighted area within the context of multiple areas
map_area_in_areas()
Map area within selected overlapping areas
map_area_in_city()
Map area in the context of city boundaries
map_area_mta_services()
Map MTA services
map_area_parks()
Map area parks and open spaces
map_area_property()
Real property or parcel data is from the Maryland State Department of Assessment and Taxation and may include outdated or inaccurate information.
map_area_zoning()
Map zoning for an area

Add a layer to a ggplot2 map

layer_area_data()
Layer for area data
layer_area_mask()
Add an area mask to a ggplot2 map as a layer
layer_area_property()
Add a layer to a gpplot2 map with area property categorized by type
layer_area_streets()
Add a layer to a gpplot2 map with area streets, street names, or both

Set a map theme, scale, or modify map limits

set_map_limits()
Set map limits to area
set_map_theme()
Set default map theme
scale_color_mapbaltimore() scale_fill_mapbaltimore()
Scales for Baltimore data
